Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

[lgwebos] Fix missing update of power channel state

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

timeline.bodyText: app  is know to be updated to empty values during app switches on TV. it will lead to temporary false power channel states. users will trigger scenes incorrectly.
timeline.author: sprehn

timeline.bodyText:
same here, we should not use this to reset to registered from a temporary empty app
however...

But we need something to move from DISCONNECTING to REGISTERED when TV is switched ON again (with WOL or simply the TV remote control). I think we should consider the receiving of data on the web socket as a trigger for that.

I somewhat doubt that WOL will abort the shutdown process.
hm... it may work for remote control. if it works I am fine
timeline.author: sprehn

replies.bodyText: It works for remote control. For WOL, I have to try again your version but I think I remember I received the app just after the WOL.
replies.author: lolodomo

timeline.bodyText: agree with this call here, but in LGWebOSTVSocket::powerOff should set the disconnecting state on successful response.
timeline.author: sprehn
